definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Opening my eyes, I saw a big boy glaring at me, a white washcloth in hand.
sentences.chinese: 睜開眼，一個大男孩望着我，手裏拿條白色毛巾。

sentences.english: He opened his eyes and via his tears looked over at the circle of string he still held clutched in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他睜開眼睛，透過淚水看向他依然捏在手裏的繩圈。

sentences.english: She never did open her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她雙眼緊閉，從這以後就再也未睜開過雙眼。

sentences.english: The old walrus turned her head slowly and opened her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 那隻老海象慢慢地轉過頭來，睜開了眼睛。

sentences.english: The sword did its work quickly, and Abanazar never opened his eyes again.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉丁手起劍落，阿巴那扎爾就再也沒有睜開眼睛了。

sentences.english: My eyes flash open in the predawn gray .
sentences.chinese: 我一下子睜開了雙眼，眼前閃現的是黎明前的灰暗。

sentences.english: He opened his eyes and through his tears looked over at the circle of string he still held clutched in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他睜開眼睛，透過淚水看向他依然捏在手裏的繩圈。

sentences.english: This patient, who could barely keep her eyelids open, was diagnosed by her eye doctor.
sentences.chinese: 圖上眼科醫生診斷的這位病人，幾乎不能把眼皮睜開。

sentences.english: Georgiana opened her eyes and looked into the mirror her husband held.
sentences.chinese: 喬治娜睜開眼睛，在丈夫舉着的鏡子裏看着自己。

sentences.english: I opened my eyes, and saw a blue bed-curtain.
sentences.chinese: 我睜開眼睛，見到的是一個帳子。

sentences.english: Open my eyes, yeah; it was only just a dream.
sentences.chinese: 睜開雙眸，耶，不過碎夢一場。

sentences.english: The great God, opened the eyes of your insight into all.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的神，睜開你的眼睛洞察一切。

sentences.english: Marius' eyelids did not open; but his half-open mouth still breathed.
sentences.chinese: 馬呂斯的眼睛沒睜開，但半開的嘴還有呼吸。

sentences.english: Dan opened one eye and said, "What?
sentences.chinese: 丹睜開一隻眼睛說，“什麼？

sentences.english: The teacher took a table, light just open your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 老師拍了桌子，小光才睜開眼睛。

sentences.english: Tonto, after having a very bad dream, woke up to see the stars up above him.
sentences.chinese: 通圖做了惡夢，他睜開眼看見許多的星星。
